welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming coastal town of Newhaven, UK! Get ready to experience breathtaking views, delicious seafood, and a rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport primarily serves low-cost and charter airlines, as well as some international carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 90-minute time limit per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome is a modern facility that serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the 'Redhill Airport WiFi' network and following the prompts.
